Articles.Content:
Hi fellow Rocketbuilders!

are there any mods which stores telemetry data from a flight into a file? 

Thanks
^ that is exactly what you want. You can send it to a website and I believe you can record it if you want. If not, that needs to be added.

Theres Graphotron 2000, with an unofficial (relatively) new version:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38319-0-21-x-Graphotron-2000/page7](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38319-0-21-x-Graphotron-2000/page7)

And I'm pretty sure you can use kOS for data logging as well, but its user intensive to set it up:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68089-0-90-kOS-Scriptable-Autopilot-System-v0-17-0-2015-4-18](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68089-0-90-kOS-Scriptable-Autopilot-System-v0-17-0-2015-4-18)

Hmm i know telemachus,fancy webstuff without export, didn't know that it can record or export, have to try this again. 

@Stone Blue i tried kos for this, but if you use kos for other things, this makes the whole programs big and ugly, BUT the graphotron looks something i am searching for. THX! Have to try it and hope it will work with the 1.0 release.
[**VOID (Vessel Orbital Information Display)**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54533-0-23-VOID-Vessel-Orbital-Informational-Display) has a CSV data logger

^^ REALLY???... I use VOID over KER and the MJ GUIs....I never realised that about VOID... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) ... 'course I dont data log, either...

> 
> @Stone Blue i tried kos for this, but if you use kos for other things, this makes the whole programs big and ugly, BUT the graphotron looks something i am searching for. THX! Have to try it and hope it will work with the 1.0 release.

Use multiple kOS units, with one dedicated for telemetry. More versatile and comprehensive than you could imagine.
